resources.string: The Roman theatre is one of the world\'s best-preserved ancient Roman theatres in the world.
The old town in Plovdiv is an architectural and historical reserve located on three of Plovdiv\'s hills.
The Plovdiv Regional Ethnographic Museum is a museum of ethnography in Plovdiv.
Alyosha is an 11-metre tall reinforced concrete statue of a Soviet soldier on Bunarjik Hill in Plovdiv.
Nebet Tepe is one of the hills of Plovdiv where the ancient town was founded.
Dzhumaya Mosque is a mosque is located in the centre of Plovdiv and was built in 1363â€“1364.
The History Museum is established in 1951, it covers the history of Plovdiv from the 15th century until today.
Beautiful fountains with music and light shows in the evening.
A great town park with beautiful children\'s playground.
Am amazing example of Renaissance architecture, with unique Turkish bath inside the house.
Great place for concerts. The club is spacious with good acoustics.
Very nice night club with live Dj\'s sets. Normal prices for the quality of drinks and service offered.
Cozy place with community of people which seem to visit it regularly and the vibe is quite warm and nice.
Nice place to chill out with friends. Atmosphere is nice and staff is nice as well.
Undoubtedly the best electronic music club in central Bulgaria with Funktion One audio system.
Amazing place, real old school rock atmosphere. The music is as you can guess rock.
A modern club where you will hear all types of music - house, modern pop, retro pop, modern Bulgarian hits.
It is one of the best bars in the city with quite good and diverse music affordable alcohol and nice atmosphere.
